ygData.subject: Re: Women on EQ: Flirting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello My name is Halle and I m an (almost) 9th level wood elf druid on the Cazic-Thule server. I say almost because after I write this I m going to go try and
ygData.messageBody:
Hello
My name is Halle and I'm an (almost) 9th level wood elf druid on the
Cazic-Thule server. I say almost because after I write this I'm going to go
try and get the level today!

There hasn't been a lot of flirting around me. I figured people were unsure
if I were a guy or a girl or something. I don't think flirting is much in my
character either. I do like going around healing folks in battles with orcs,
or snaring orcs so that the fighter can get away if need be.

It will be nice getting to know you all.
Halle
-----Original Message-----
From: Shelly James <sj@...>
To: 'EQ_women@onelist.com' <EQ_women@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 2:18 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_women] Women on EQ: Flirting


>From: Shelly James <sj@...>
>
>Hi,
>
>Yes I do get flirted with quite often. I don't really flirt back because it
>is not in character with my human Paladin. I really think it's the armor I
>wear. I guess its OK as long as it does not get in the way of my killing.
>:-)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Heather Hire [mailto:hrootbeer@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 12:48 PM
>To: EQ_women
>Subject: [EQ_women] Women on EQ: Flirting
>
>From: Heather Hire <hrootbeer@...>
>
>I'm throwing out a topic ladies, just want to see what experiences you
>have had.....
>
>Flirting
>
>My character is the biggest flirt! I discovered early in the game that
>most males (no matter what race) liked the look of my character, a
>half-elf. Many flirted with her before she even knew she was cute. It
>was in-character for Genneth (a bard) to flirt, so she is constantly
>engaging in flirting.
>
>And to add to it, Genn has herself somewhat of a boyfriend in the game,
>another member of her guild, Teban. ('Course she still flirts with
>others, but he understands that she is mostly committed to him ;) So,
>has this phenomenon hit anyone else? Do you get flirted with? Have
>you found yourself a steady??
>
>Just curious
>
